DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether patient undergo dorsal cheilectomy procedure implementation amniotic membrane tissue result improve clinical functional outcome compare standard dorsal cheilectomy procedure . Specific Aim 1 : To compare American Orthopedic Foot Ankle Society ( AOFAS ) score patient undergo dorsal cheilectomy patient undergo dorsal cheilectomy implantation amniotic membrane tissue . Hypothesis 1 : Clinical functional outcome , measure AOFAS , patient undergo dorsal cheilectomy implantation amniotic membrane tissue superior without . Specific Aim 2 : To compare range motion patient undergo dorsal cheilectomy patient undergo dorsal cheilectomy implantation amniotic membrane tissue . Hypothesis 2 : Patient undergo dorsal cheilectomy implantation amniotic membrane tissue demonstrate less postoperative stiffness measure pre-and postoperative radiograph . Specific Aim 3 : To compare Foot Function Index ( FFI ) score patient undergo dorsal cheilectomy patient undergo dorsal cheilectomy implantation amniotic membrane tissue . Hypothesis 3 : Clinical functional outcome , measure FFI , patient undergo dorsal cheilectomy implantation amniotic membrane tissue superior without .
DOC.brief_title: Amniotic Membrane Adjunct Treatment Hallux Rigidus
